text: Gunfire is a 1950 American film directed by William Berke.Memories of a Movie- Mad Girlhood By CARYL RIVERS. New York Times (13 June 1971: D15. It was also known as Frank James Rides Again.FRANK JAMES RIDES AGAIN Monthly Film Bulletin; London Vol. 20, Iss. 228, (Jan 1, 1953): 35. ==Plot== Frank James' plans at a quiet life are threatened by the arrival of a lookalike. ==Cast== *Don Barry as Frank James *Robert Lowery ==References== ==External links== * *Gunfire at BFI Category:1950 films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by William A. Berke Category:1950 Western (genre) films Category:Lippert Pictures films
title: Gunfire (film)
